String.string: The Menhir of Vitality is calling you.
You found the entrance to Thulsa's research facility, the Necromancer Tomb. You can enter using the teleportal.
Find the entrance to the Necromancer Tomb in the Bloody Depths.
Join Lastair in Necromancer Tomb. [You must select Necromancer Tomb (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:233#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
You found Akkhan. He's badly wounded.
Find Akkhan, one of Kaidun's soldiers.
No one can escape the reach of Thulsa!
How...how can the power of Thulsa fail?
Eliminate Trayzadius in the Warden's Chamber.
Destroy the necromantic devices with the liquid key and eliminate {@linkcreature:3004#13#Dalmanak} the Glutton.
Take out the {@linkcreature:3004#15#monster that was Kaidun} in the Chapel of Pain to free the general's soul.
Go back to Acarum and report what happened to Harule.
Return to Allemantheia and deliver Kaidun's last words to Commander Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter.]
Return to Allemantheia and deliver Kaidun's last words to Commander Fraya.
